channel.title: Rxruby on Ilija Eftimov
channel.description: Recent content in Rxruby on Ilija Eftimov

item.title: Understanding Reactive Programming with RxRuby
item.description: Reactive Programming is a relatively new and interesting programming paradigm that has picked up quite a bit of popularity lately. Out of curiosity, I did a bit of research over the weekend. In this blog post I will summarize what I learned and try to explain what RP to any novice out there. Also, I show you how to use the Reactive Extensions for Ruby. Let’s dive in! The Motivation I rarely have strong opinions, but I really think that to understand anything in life, you need to understand the motivation behind it.
